node.description:
The second episode in the probably-incorrectly-named 'season 4' of [The Everything2 podcast].

  • [Everything Stops for Tea] by [Junkill] (read by the author)
  • [Drinking From the Water Hose] by [jessicapierce] (read by [liveforever])
  • [Waiting is the only part] by [just1wheat] (read by [OldMiner])
  • [(prayer for the departed)] by [dem bones] (read by [Dimview])
  • [Weak and desperate from decades of commuting the djinn would barter all for coffee and a friendly ear] by [The Custodian] (read by the author)
node.title: E2 Podcast Season 4, Episode 2
